name: Voyage and Return
description: The hero travels to a strange new world, has adventures, then returns home transformed
examples: Alice in Wonderland, The Wizard of Oz, Avatar

anticipation_stage.name: Anticipation Stage
anticipation_stage.description: Life in the ordinary world before the journey

journey.name: The Journey
journey.description: The hero travels to or discovers the strange new world

first_wonder.name: First Wonder
first_wonder.description: Initial fascination with the strange new world

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.description: The new world reveals its darker, more dangerous aspects

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: The hero is trapped or threatened in the strange world

thrilling_escape.name: Thrilling Escape
thrilling_escape.description: The hero escapes and returns to the familiar world

return.name: Return Transformed
return.description: The hero returns home changed by the experience
